alert.note: Alert for Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Interstate 5 Corridor; Los Angeles County Beaches; Malibu Coast; Santa Susana Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 07 at 9:51PM PST until January 08 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Northwest to north winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts 35 to 45 mph. Strongest winds in the mountains and foothills. * WHERE...Portions of southwest California. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
